description: During the [2015 Ukraine Electric Power Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0028), [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) moved their tools laterally within the corporate network and between the ICS and corporate network. (Citation: Booz Allen Hamilton)

external_references.description: Booz Allen Hamilton   When The Lights Went Out Retrieved. 2019/10/22
